query: I need a 7-day travel plan for 2 people, starting in Peoria and visiting 3 different cities in Texas from March 4th to March 10th, 2022. We have a budget of $7,200 for this trip. When considering our accommodations, we prefer private rooms. For transportation, we won't be considering any flights. As for meals, we love Indian, American, Chinese, and Italian cuisines.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Lubbock,San Angelo,Dallas]
